hero.title: AI Genesis
hero.subtitle: Interactive Meta-Tutorial for Creating a Website in Replit
hero.description: Groundbreaking, interactive website showing the symbiotic relationship between human creativity and artificial intelligence in web application development.

phase0.title: Phase 0: Spark
phase0.subtitle: Idea and AI Brief
phase0.userNote: I want a website that shows how AI helps create websites... meta! Make it interactive, with code examples, maybe some animations? And show the whole process - from idea to deployment.
phase0.aiDescription: From this simple description, AI generated a complete technical specification including: interactive narrative, innovative Control Hub, debugging workshop, translation module, and full implementation with tests.

phase1.title: Phase 1: Foundations
phase1.subtitle: Setup and Architecture
phase1.typeScriptDesc: Modern stack ensuring type safety, fast development, and optimal bundling.
phase1.tailwindDesc: Utility-first CSS with smooth animations for modern UX.
phase1.netlifyDesc: Serverless backend with Vitest and React Testing Library for QA.
phase1.stackReasoning: I chose this stack because TypeScript ensures type safety in a dynamic environment, Vite offers the fastest hot reload, and TailwindCSS enables rapid prototyping without design compromises.

phase2.title: Phase 2: UI Innovation
phase2.subtitle: Birth of Control Hub
phase2.designReasoning: Traditional navbar is inefficient for narrative pages. The side 'Control Hub' keeps context and tools always at hand without obscuring content. Inspired by IDE and developer tool interfaces.
phase2.navDesc: Smooth scrolling with tooltips on icon hover.
phase2.themeDesc: Smooth transitions between themes with localStorage.
phase2.a11yDesc: High contrast, focus management, ARIA labels.
phase2.hubDescription: Control Hub doesn't obscure content while remaining always accessible...

phase3.title: Phase 3: Development
phase3.subtitle: Interactive Debugging Workshops
phase3.userRequest: Generate ImageModal.tsx component. Must accept src and alt as props. Implement closing on background click and Escape key. Use React Portals to render in body.
phase3.aiResponse: Done. Component implemented using React Portals. Added event handling and focus trap for improved accessibility. Code is in

phase5.title: Phase 6: Grand Finale
phase5.subtitle: Deployment and Quality Proof
phase5.testingDesc: The project uses Vitest and React Testing Library to ensure the highest code quality. Every component is tested for functionality and accessibility.
phase5.lighthouseDesc: The site achieves excellent results in all Lighthouse categories, confirming high technical quality.
phase5.deploymentDesc: Automatic deployment from GitHub, resource optimization, CDN and SSL. Full CI/CD integration.
phase5.conclusion: AI Genesis is more than a website - it's living proof of the power of collaboration between humans and artificial intelligence. Every line of code, every design element was thoughtfully created to showcase the full potential of modern web development.
phase5.perfectDesc: Application meets the highest quality standards in every category
phase5.finalDescription: The AI Genesis project demonstrates the full potential of human-AI collaboration in creating modern web applications. From initial idea to production deployment - this is the future of development.

contact.subtitle: Ready for your own AI-assisted development project?

seo.title: AI Genesis: Interactive Meta-Tutorial | Replit Development Masterclass
seo.description: Groundbreaking interactive tutorial showing the complete project lifecycle - from idea to deployment using AI and modern technologies.
